distros.description: Wind River Linux (Example minimal distribution, will require customization)
distros.name: wrlinux-tiny

distros.description: Wind River Linux (Full Featured Distribution with Sato)
distros.name: wrlinux-std-sato

layerItems.description:
OpenEmbedded-Core is a layer containing the core metadata for current versions
of OpenEmbedded. It is distro-less (can build a functional image with
DISTRO = "nodistro") and contains only emulated machine support.
layerItems.name: openembedded-core

layerItems.description:
This layer contains the metadata necessary to build the klibc library and
utilities (shared and static) plus other tools useful for the creation of
small-sized initramfs.
layerItems.name: meta-initramfs
layerItems.summary: klibc library and related utilities for building an initramfs

layerItems.description: The XFCE Desktop software and related components.
layerItems.name: meta-xfce

layerItems.description: Filesystem related libraries and programs.  Includes support for FUSE and related components.
layerItems.name: meta-filesystems

layerItems.description:
This layer provides support for building web servers, web-based
applications and related software.
layerItems.name: meta-webserver
layerItems.summary: Web server software and web-based applications

layerItems.description:
This layer is intended to be a central point for networking-related
packages and configuration.  It should be useful directly on top of
oe-core and compliments meta-openembedded.  It should be primarily useful
to the following groups:
layerItems.name: meta-networking

layerItems.description: Multimedia related components such as gstreamer, alsa, dvb, etc.
layerItems.name: meta-multimedia

layerItems.description:
This layer provides lxc package build for Wind River Linux.  It
is required by most other layers that Wind River provides.
layerItems.name: meta-virtualization

layerItems.description:
This layer is intended to be a central point for realtime related kernel and
system development. It also contains utilities, and configuration useful for
tuning a realtime system. It should be useful directly on top of oe-core.  It
should be primarily useful to the following groups:
layerItems.name: meta-realtime

layerItems.description:
This layer provides the Wind River Linux distribution definitions, 
distribution-specific integration and bug fixes, and other wrlinux components.
layerItems.name: wrlinux

layerItems.description:
This layer provides template processing support to OpenEmbedded.  Wind River
templates are a mechanism that permit various configurations to be enabled
with a simple setting.
layerItems.name: wr-template

layerItems.description: The base distribution settings for wrlinux and related DISTRO items.
layerItems.name: wrlinux-distro
layerItems.summary: Wind River Linux base distribution layer

recipes.description: This package provides a compressed cpio image used for an initial ram disk for the kernel boot. Additionally, a kernel bundled with initramfs is included as well whenever feature/initramfs-install configured.
An image which approximates WRLinux glibc-std without graphics.
recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image

recipes.description: Wind River Linux GNU-based (non-busybox) core root filesystem
recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image

recipes.description: Small image capable of booting a device. The kernel includes the Minimal RAM-based Initial Root Filesystem (initramfs), which finds the first 'init' program more efficiently.
recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image

recipes.description: A foundational tiny image that boots to a console.
recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image

recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image

recipes.description: An image which approximates WRLinux glibc-std without graphics.
recipes.inherits: core-image image image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch meta populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrlinux-image wrltemplate_image
